single: Find all rows of text in Simplified Chinese and skip all other rows. Return a valid json object with the original text (key == 'chinese') and the English Translation (key == 'english'). If no text is found return empty strings as values
multiple: For every image find all rows of text in Simplified Chinese and skip all other rows. Return a list of valid json objects with the respective images original text (key == 'chinese') and the English Translation (key == 'english'). If no text is found return empty strings as values.
